name: FartPolice
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fart police
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In the year 2,505, farting in undesignated areas has been outlawed. The FPD, or Fart Police Department was formed to catch unlawful flatulators. Farting in public is a crime, pass gas and you do the time. We have sensors in all public areas to detect the illegal release of methane.

You will be presented with a case and a list of suspects. Compare the suspect's farts with the fart recorded at the scene of the crime to find the perpetrator. If you charge three suspects incorrectly, you lose and must start a new game.

Premium Content:
This skill offers premium content in the form of a subscription called Fart Police Special Ops. Fart Police Special Ops grants additional random dialogue and unlimited play.

Send any feedback to contact@digitalhokum.games

Things you can say in-game:
* New Game
* Next Suspect
* Charge
* Repeat
* Subscribe
* Help

Fart Police was developed by Digital Hokum. Check out our other games if you like Fart Police!
* Gacha Pets
* Townsmith: Fame or Fortune
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
